Example projects

Source: vignettes/examples.Rmd
examples.Rmd

The examples below illustrate the use of flexdashboard with various packages and layouts. If you want to learn more about how the dashboards were created each example includes a link to its source code.

NBA scoring with d3heatmap
ggplotly: ggplot2 geoms
Shiny: biclust example
Shiny: CRAN downloads
Linked time-series with dygraphs
Sales report with highcharter
Storyboard: htmlwidgets showcase
Shiny: ggplot2 linked brushing
rbokeh: iris dataset
MetricsGraphics: Tor Project
Shiny: kmeans clustering
leaflet: nuclear waste sites
ggplotly: various examples
Pokemon characters with highcharter
Shiny: Old faithful eruptions
Shiny: Diamonds explorer
Shiny: Embedding
Shiny: Neighborhood diversity

flexdashboard is built for R Markdown, an ecosystem of packages for creating computational documents in R. Learn more at rmarkdown.rstudio.com.

Site built with pkgdown 2.0.7.
